page.title: 07Housing: Rosneath & Rhu
page.content: Four categories of ownership: 1.Owner-occupied. 2.Dumbarton D.C. 3.S.S.H.A 4.MOD At one time only category l owned by individuals but since recent change in government policy people buying from 2 and 3. Before expansion of MOD Coulport & Faslane bases housing mainly of traditional single dwellings but 2, 3 & 4 introduced terraced hous- ing schemes bringing urbanised appear- ance to rural area. Rhu 26/83 & 27/83: l983 development by Brosely behind main road. Terraced houses and 3 storey flats. Flats by Keanie on main road 10 yrs old.Site former Waters Edge Hotel for flats. Large old houses some sub-divided..Gardens now contain modern bungalows. Executive house building plots sold for Â£25000.
